articles.author: By Emer Scully James Gant For Mailonline
articles.title: Captain Tom Moore's 100th birthday Spitfire flypast is CANCELLED - Daily Mail
articles.description: Pilots from the Battle of Britain Memorial Flight, based at RAF Coningsby in Lincolnshire, are expected to lead a display over the veteran's home in Marston Moretaine, Bedfordshire.
articles.content:
Captain Tom Moore will get a Spitfire flypast to mark his 100th birthday on Thursday despite reports to the contrary - because the Royal Air Force is scheduled to perform a salute that had not been announced for fear of attracting crowds.
It was thought a sp… [+10524 chars]

articles.title: Michelle Obama: 'Rare and up-close' Becoming documentary set for release - Sky News
articles.description: The former first lady has said she hopes viewers will "find joy and a bit of respite" in the film, which follows her book tour.

articles.title: Watch Dave Grohl play Foo Fighters’ ‘Everlong’ for emergency trauma nurse - NME
articles.description: Dave Grohl surprised a New York trauma nurse with a special performance of Foo Fighters' 'Everlong' to thank them for their work in battling coronavirus

articles.author: Rachel McGrath
articles.title: Britain’s Got Talent: 12-year-old Fayth Ifil wins Simon Cowell’s golden buzzer with Proud Mary performance - Evening Standard
articles.description: The young singer stunned the judges
articles.content:
A 12-year-old singer became the latest person to go straight through to the Britains Got Talent semi-finals on Saturday. 
Fayth Ifil wowed the judges with her performance of Tina Turners iconic track Proud Mary. 
Arriving on stage, she had told the panel ab… [+2046 chars]

articles.title: Coronation Street spoilers: Tim discovers that dad Geoff's abuse? - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: Tim is horrified when he hears what's happened to Geoff, but Alya's quick to enlighten everyone about Yasmeen.
articles.content:
(Picture: ITV)
Geoff Metcalfe (Ian Bartholomew) has been abusing and controlling every aspect of Yasmeen Nazirs (Shelley King) life in Coronation Street, but son Tim (Joe Duttine) has remained none-the-wiser believing his dad to be the most kind and gentle m… [+2116 chars]

articles.author: By Emma Powell Showbusiness Correspondent For The Daily Mail
articles.title: BBC Race Across the World winners Emon and Jamiul Choudhury discuss nail biting finale - Daily Mail
articles.description: Uncle and nephew Emon and Jamiul Choudhury have shared the 'amazing experience' of taking part and eventually winning BBC's Race Across the World following the climax of the show on Sunday.
articles.content:
After travelling for 54 days through 17 countries in a dash to the end of the Earth, Emon and Jamiul Choudhury triumphed by a mere 20 seconds. 
But instead of splitting their hard-won £20,000 prize, the uncle and nephew duo will donate half of it to help chi… [+2347 chars]

articles.content:
